body_html:
@CalmWaves
I've prepared compiler options and .a library files for x86 and x86_64
Could you try this branch?

https://github.com/miyosuda/TensorFlowAndroidDemo/tree/x86

(I've also upgraded to TensorFlow r0.8)

When I tried this with x86 emulator, the app crashed with IllegalArgumentException at
CameraManager.openCamera()
because emulator does not have camera.

body:
@CalmWaves 
I've prepared compiler options and .a library files for x86 and x86_64
Could you try this branch?

https://github.com/miyosuda/TensorFlowAndroidDemo/tree/x86

(I've also upgraded to TensorFlow r0.8)

When I tried this with x86 emulator, the app crashed with IllegalArgumentException at
CameraManager.openCamera()
because emulator does not have camera.
